com.nnk.springboot.controllers

Class TradeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nnk.springboot.controllers.TradeController

  • @Controller
public class TradeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for displaying thymeleaf view of Trade management.

      • validate

        @PostMapping(value="/trade/validate")
public java.lang.String validate(@Valid
                                                                        @Valid TradeDto tradeDto,
                                                                        org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        Validate the add Trade form. If form contains errors, show the form view to display fields validation errors. Else, call the service layer to persist Trade and return the Trade list view.
        Parameters:
        tradeDto - of the form
        result - hold validation errors
        Returns:
        View

                                                                                org.springframework.ui.Model model)
                                                                         throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Show a view with update Trade form prefilled with Trade current values.
        Parameters:
        id - of the Trade to update
        model - of the view
        Returns:
        View
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when the requested Trade not found

      • updateTrade

        @PostMapping(value="/trade/update/{id}")
public java.lang.String updateTrade(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                              java.lang.Integer id,
                                                                              @Valid
                                                                              @Valid TradeDto tradeDto,
                                                                              org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
                                                                       throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Validate the update Trade form. If form contains errors, show the form view to display fields validation errors. Else, call the service layer to persist Trade and return to Trade list view.
        Parameters:
        id - of the Trade to update
        tradeDto - of the form
        result - hold validation errors
        Returns:
        View
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when the requested Trade not found
